content: सूत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [सू-क्त] {@--1@} Born, begotten, engendered, produced. {@--2@} Impelled, emitted. --तः {@--1@} A charioteer; सूत चोदयाश्वान् पुण्याश्रमदर्शनेन तावदात्मानं पुनीमहे <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--2@} The son of a Kṣatriya by a woman of the Brāhmaṇa caste (his business being that of a charioteer); क्षत्रियाद्विप्रकन्यायां सूतो भवति जातितः <ls>Ms. 10. 11</ls>; सूतो वा सूतपुत्रो वा यो वा को वा भवाम्यहं <ls>Ve. 3. 33.</ls> {@--3@} The son of a Vaiśya by a Kshatriya wife (his business being that of a bard). {@--4@} A bard. {@--5@} A carpenter. {@--6@} The sun. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a pupil of Vyāsa. --तः तं Quick-silver.
